caption.center: STATE ex rel. Creighton WUNEBURGER v. STATE of Louisiana.

opinion.posture: In re Wuneburger, Creighton; â€” Plaintiff; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Jefferson, 24th Judicial District Court Div. A, Nos. 95-6486, 92-1052; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, No. 06-KH-689.
opinion.opinion_text: Denied. La.C.Cr.P. art. 930.8; State ex rel. Glover v.State, 93-2330 (La. 9/5/95), 660 So.2d 1189; State exrel. Bernard v. Cr.D.C., 94-2247, p. 1 (La. 4/28/95),653 So.2d 1174, 1175.
